Container.Name: fluidd
Container.Overview:
Fluidd is a free and open-source Klipper web interface for managing your 3d printer.
You should be able to connect to Moonraker over the network. Copy the config in your configuration Path: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluidd-core/fluidd/develop/server/config.json
Container.Category: Productivity: Other: Network:Web Network:Management Network:Other Status:Beta
Container.Description:
Fluidd is a free and open-source Klipper web interface for managing your 3d printer.
